text: The Dalvi Koli () is a clan (Gotra) of the Koli caste found in the Indian state of Maharashtra. == Estates == The Palval was a small principality ruled by Jaswantarao Dalvi under the Sultanates of Deccan (1662). == References == == Other websites == * Gazetteer of the Bombay Presidency ..., Volume 18, Part 1 Category:Koli clans
title: Dalvi Koli
